attributes.action: Stop the daylight robbery of charging for refuse disposal for homeowners that recycle all/do not use council wheelie bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been told by neath/port talbot council that even though I do not use my wheelie bin I still have to pay for its collection and disposal. I am affectively paying for a service that I am not using!!
I would like to see the introduction of a credit system for non use of wheelie bins that can be redeemed against the  council tax bill. A simple barcode scanner run across empty bins to verify non use.
